title: Galaxy Note 20 and 20 Ultra: two very different phones
description: Samsung's Galaxy Note 20 and the high-end Galaxy Note 20 Ultra are here. The Galaxy Note 20 Ultra is a spec beast with 5G, a huge screen, and a 50x zoom camera. The regular Note 20 is less impressive but still expensive. It starts at $999.99 while the Ultra is priced higher. Both are available for preorder and their release date is August 21st, 2020.  Learn more:   If you buy something from a Verge link, Vox Media may earn a commission. Seeour ethics policy:   Order the Galaxy Note 20 and Note 20 Ultra at Best Buy:   0:00 Intro 0:38 Similarities 1:10 Color options 1:39 Displays 2:26 Hardware 3:30 DeX, Wireless, S pen & more 3:58 Camera 5:20 Video 6:00 Battery life 6:15 Storage & Price 6:47 Remember when 7:30 The Note 20 Ultra though 7:51 Outro  Subscribe:  Subscribe to Verge Science:   Community guidelines:  Wallpapers from The Verge:
